name: Sounds from the Lighthouse: BioShock 2 Original Soundtrack
summary: This is a rare soundtrack that was only available for a short period of time to people who bought the collector's edition of the game. It contains 48 minutes of the lavish live orchestral score from BioShock 2 that was recorded with some of the finest musicians in Hollywood. This album's sleeve includes exclusive notes from the game's composer (Garry Schyman) who has won numerous music of the year awards for the original BioShock score, and is well known for his other game scores including Dante's Inferno, Resistance: Retribution, Front Mission Evolved, and the Destroy All Humans! series. With its perfectly crafted mix of sorrow and sheer terror, top-notch orchestral composing and avant-garde techniques, and overall brilliant impact, the score from BioShock 2 is perfect for anyone who enjoyed the game or who appreciates deeply moving music from films or games.
